amendment.description: Amendment sought to maintain HUD's authority to issue demolition-only grants.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 4 printed in House Report 110-509 to maintain HUD's authority to issue demolition-only grants.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Sessions amendment (A004) Failed by recorded vote: 186 - 221 (Roll no. 14).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A004) offered by Mr. Sessions.
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
